DOC.detailed_description: Summary project video-assisted thyroidectomy ( MIVAT ) : General anesthesia ( GA ) versus hypnosis ( HY ) Investigators Prof. Michel Mourad* , Dr. Christine Watremez ** , Prof. Fabienne Roelants** * Surgery Abdominal Transplantation Division ** Department Anesthesiology , Université Catholique de Louvain , Cliniques Universitaires Saint-Luc , Avenue Hippocrate 10 , 1200 Brussels , Belgium 1 . Aim The aim pilot study prospectively investigate , consecutive series patient , feasibility safety MIVAT HY associate local anesthesia , compare GA. 2 . Inclusion criterion - Adult patient candidate total partial thyroidectomy . - ASA 1 , 2 3 - One surgeon ( MM ) - Informed consent 3 . Exclusion criterion - Age < 18 year - The presence familial medullary thyroid cancer - Suspicious metastatic lymph node - Redo surgery - ASA 4 patient - Patients chronic pain - Deaf people - Patients psychiatric disease - Known recurrent nerve paralysis 4 . Outcome evaluation - Primary outcome : safety feasibility . - During surgery , consider event analysis include operating time ( skin incision skin closure ) , total time operate room , intraoperative bleeding , drug consumption , Hemodynamic change conversion rate MIVAT conventional approach HY GA. - After surgery , comparative variable analysis include : drug consumption , hospital stay , calcemia , vocal cord abnormality basis day-one laryngoscopy perform ENT doctor involve study . 5 . Patients selection study group : Selection patient MIVAT base size gland nodule , provide craniocaudal axis lobe exceed 7cm large transversal diameter less 3.5cm . All patient assign undergo MIVAT instruct possibility conversion conventional approach . The patient leave free choose type anesthesia prefere surgical intervention . They give informed consent procedure . A . General anesthesia group : Premedication : - Lorazepam 0.5 mg 1 h surgery - ECG , NIBP , SaO2 - VVP + NaCl 0.9 % 500 mL + taradyl 0.5 mg / kg ( < 30 mg ) Induction : - Remifentanil 0.05 µg/kg/min - Propofol 2 mg/kg - Intubation armor endotracheal tube specially devise neuromonitoring vocal cord . During surgery : - Sevoflurane / Remifentanil B. Hypnosis group : Premedication : - Lorazepam 0.5 mg 1 h avant l'intervention - ECG , NIBP , SaO2 - VVP + NaCl 0.9 % 500 mL + taradyl 0.5 mg / kg ( < 30 mg ) Induction surgery : - Remifentanil modify request - Induction hypnosis accord Milton Eriksson technique - Midazolam ( titrate 0.1 mg/0.1mg ) need anxiolytic . - Local anesthesia mixture ( lidocaine 0.5 % /ropivacaine 0.25 % ) administer surgeon along incision line 5 minute make skin incision .
